history.proof: intros n E t T H1 m H2. induction H1. - apply JVar. auto. - sauto lq: on depth: 3use: JApp. - qsimpl time: 1 use: JApp. - sauto lq: on depth: 3use: JApp. - srun best use: Nat.lt_eq_cases, Nat.lt_le_trans, Nat.nle_gt, Nat.lt_le_incl, not_ge, Nat.add_0_l, JTyApp unfold: mymax, gt, ge.

ctx: intros n E t T H1 m H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros n E t T H1 m H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply JApp with (m1 := m1) (m2 := m2); auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable T1.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n E t T -> forall m : nat, m >= n -> j m E t T

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive j : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j n E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> j n E (TApp t1 t2) T2 | JTyAbs : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive ty : Set := TyVar : nat -> ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty | TyForall : ty -> ty Arguments TyVar _%nat_scope
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
j_sind : forall P : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P n E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> P m2 E t2 T1 -> P n E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P n e t t0
j_ind : forall P : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P n E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> P m2 E t2 T1 -> P n E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P n e t t0
JTyApp : forall (n m : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T U U' : ty), j m E t (TyForall T) -> m < n -> subst U 0 T = U' -> j n E t U'
JTyAbs : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n (map (shift 0) E) t T -> j n E t (TyForall T)
JVar : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j n E (TVar x) T
JAbs : forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
JApp : forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> j n E (TApp t1 t2) T2
closed_subst_invariant : forall (k : nat) (t : ty), closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> forall v : ty, subst v j t = t
closed_lift_invariant : forall k t : nat, closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> forall w : nat, lift w j t = t
closed_monotonic : LiftLift -> forall k t : nat, closed k t -> forall j : nat, j >= k -> closed j t
closed = fun (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (k : nat) (t : T) => shift k t = t : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> T -> Prop Arguments closed {T}%type_scope {H} _%nat_scope
Build_TraverseRelative : forall (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t) -> TraverseRelative
ZifyClasses.mkbrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (ZifyClasses.inj n) (ZifyClasses.inj m)) -> ZifyClasses.BinRel R
Record TraverseRelative (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseRelative { traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t } Arguments TraverseRelative {V T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_TraverseRelative [V T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
subst_lift : forall (v : ty) (k : nat) (t : ty), subst v k (shift k t) = t
not_lt : forall n m : nat, ~ n < m -> n >= m
not_ge : forall n m : nat, ~ n >= m -> n < m
Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
mymax_r : forall i j : nat, mymax i j >= j
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Record BinRel (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S T) : Type := mkbrel { TR : T -> T -> Prop; TRInj : forall n m : S, R n m < -> TR (ZifyClasses.inj n) (ZifyClasses.inj m) } BinRel has primitive projections with eta conversion. Arguments ZifyClasses.BinRel {S T}%type_scope _%function_scope {I} Arguments ZifyClasses.mkbrel (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
Znat.inj_ge : forall n m : nat, n >= m -> BinInt.Z.ge (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m)
nat_compare_ge : forall n m : nat, n >= m < -> (n ?= m) <> Lt
mymax_l : forall i j : nat, mymax i j >= i
dec_ge : forall n m : nat, Decidable.decidable (n >= m)
TraverseRelative_term = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> term) (p : nat) (t : term) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TVar n) = traverse g l (TVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t0 : term) (IHt : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (m l : nat) (H : forall...
TraverseRelative_ty = {| traverse_relative := fun (f g : nat -> nat -> ty) (p : nat) (t : ty) => ty_ind (fun t0 : ty => forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t0 = traverse g l t0) (fun (n m l : nat) (H : forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) (H0 : m = l + p) => eq_ind_r (fun m0 : nat => traverse f m0 (TyVar n) = traverse g l (TyVar n)) (H l n) H0) (fun (t1 : ty) (IHt1 : forall m l : nat, (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t1 = traverse g l t1) (t2 : ty) (IHt...
ZifyClasses.mkbop : forall (S1 S2 S3 T : Type) (Op : S1 -> S2 -> S3) (I1 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S1 T) (I2 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S2 T) (I3 : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S3 T) (TBOp : T -> T -> T), (forall (n : S1) (m : S2), ZifyClasses.inj (Op n m) = TBOp (ZifyClasses.inj n) (ZifyClasses.inj m)) -> ZifyClasses.BinOp Op
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
RingMicromega.ge_bool_cases : forall n m : nat, if RingMicromega.ge_bool n m then n >= m else n < m
Nat.lt_le_incl : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n <= m
ty_ind : forall P : ty -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (TyVar n)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> P (TyForall t)) -> forall t : ty, P t
ty_rec : forall P : ty -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (TyVar n)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> P (TyForall t)) -> forall t : ty, P t
term_rec : forall P : term -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
ty_rect : forall P : ty -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (TyVar n)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> P (TyForall t)) -> forall t : ty, P t
ty_sind : forall P : ty -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (TyVar n)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> forall t0 : ty, P t0 -> P (TyArrow t t0)) -> (forall t : ty, P t -> P (TyForall t)) -> forall t : ty, P t
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_rect : forall P : term -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_sind : forall P : term -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t

```coq
intros n E t T H1 m H2.
induction H1.
- apply JVar. assumption.
- apply JAbs with (m := m); assumption.
- apply JApp with (m1 := m1) (m2 := m2); assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros n E t T H1 m H2. induction H1. - apply JVar. auto. - apply JAbs with (m := m); auto. - apply JApp with (m1 := m1) (m2 := m2); auto.
